solution_line_template: During the first three games Clayton scored {game1_points} points + {game2_points} + {game3_points} = <<{game1_points}+{game2_points}+{game3_points}={total_points_first_three_games}>>{total_points_first_three_games} points.

The average for Clayton's first three games is {total_points_first_three_games} points / {number_of_games_for_average} = <<{total_points_first_three_games}/{number_of_games_for_average}={average_points_first_three_games}>>{average_points_first_three_games} points per game.

For the first four games, Clayton scored {total_points_first_three_games} points + {average_points_first_three_games} points = <<{total_points_first_three_games}+{average_points_first_three_games}={total_points_first_four_games}>>{total_points_first_four_games} points.
